org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.actions

Class ChooseVmControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.actions.ChooseVmControl

  • public class ChooseVmControl
extends java.lang.Object
    A UI control that presents the list of connections with remote V8 VMs. User may choose several VMs.
